text: Youhanna Golta (27 January 1937 â€“ 15 February 2022) was an Egyptian Coptic Catholic hierarch. He was born in Cairo, Egypt. He became a priest in 1960. He was auxiliary and curial bishop of the Coptic Catholic Patriarchate of Alexandria, Egypt, from 1986 until his retirement in 2020. Gotta died on 15 February 2022, at the age of 85. ==References== Category:1937 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Eastern Catholic bishops Category:People from Cairo
title: Youhanna Golta
